participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about the arts, and determined. Values personal happiness and self-expression.
participant_1.background: I've been taking ballet lessons behind my parents' backs. I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like. I want to move. My favorite jello is the blue one. I love people with a sense of humor.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, health-conscious, and nurturing. Enjoys learning and sharing experiences with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I take care of myself physically and mentally. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment. I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together. I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico.

content.text: Hi, I hope you're having a great day!
Hi, thanks! I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing alright. I just got back from a ballet class.
Oh, cool! Ballet is such a beautiful art form.
Thanks! I've been taking lessons behind my parents' backs, though.
Oh, really? Why is that?
They're not really supportive of it. They think it's a waste of time.
That's too bad. But I'm glad you're doing what you love, even if they don't approve.
Thanks. Yeah, I'm trying to live my life for myself.
That's the best way to do it.
I agree. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to ski and snowboard! I also like to read and go to the gym.
Oh, that's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to ski.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's awesome! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
Oh, that must be really fun!
It is! I love working with kids.
That's great.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a nurse.
Oh, that's really cool!
Thanks!
So, what's your favorite thing to do in New Mexico?
I love to go hiking in the mountains
